name: Untitled Pizza Game
description:
Try to get to $1000 as fast as possible to pay off your debt. Make pizzas at the Pizza Making Station and then cook them in the Pizza Ovens. When they're cooked take them out and put them in a Pizza Box and throw them upwards towards their corresponding order. All Pizzas need sauce and cheese along with their listed toppings.

LEFT: Pizza Making Station

MIDDLE: Pizza Boxes

RIGHT: Pizza Ovens

Use Z to:

- Enter and Navigate the Pizza Making Station

- Make Pizza Boxes

- Take Pizzas out of Oven

- Throw Pizzas (Unboxed Pizzas are thrown horizontally and discarded, Boxed Pizzas are thrown Upwards, so make sure you're aligned with the proper order)

Use X to:

-Exit the Pizza Making Station

-Put a Pizza in the  Oven

-Put a Pizza in a Box
